title: HandTalk: Real-Time Sign Language Recognition
description: End-to-end SLR system using Bi-Directional LSTMs and MediaPipe landmarks. Features a distributed architecture with sub-200ms inference latency via WebSockets.

title: Sign Language Benchmarking Framework
description: A specialized framework for multi-dataset SLR benchmarking, evaluating model performance across diverse spatial and temporal gesture datasets.

title: High-Performance Football Inference Engine
description: Ultra-low latency C++ inference engine using TensorRT and OpenCV for real-time player tracking and tactical analysis. Optimized for high FPS production environments.

title: Coach Pro: System Orchestrator (Backend)
description: Centralized Node.js/Python backend orchestrating computer vision tasks, handling real-time data streams and system communication for sports analytics.

title: Coach Pro: Mobile Analytics Platform
description: Cross-platform Flutter application providing real-time data visualization and tactical feedback for football coaches based on AI-processed video.

title: SignLink: Communication Platform
description: A comprehensive accessibility app for speech-impaired users integrating text, voice, and sign-to-text translation modules.

title: Mr. Grammar - AI Writing Assistant
description: AI-powered Flutter app for real-time grammar and vocabulary correction using the Gemini API for natural language understanding.

title: IntelliManage - Intelligent Project Management
description: Full-stack project management platform built with Java 21/Spring Boot and Angular, featuring Spring AI for automated task management.

title: Harmonia - Alzheimer's Support App
description: Privacy-first Flutter app for Alzheimer's patients featuring offline CSV storage and intelligent reminders for patient independence.

title: Gemini GUI Agent
description: AI-powered automation agent leveraging Gemini API to perform intelligent tasks and interactions through graphical user interfaces.

title: Spendora - Personal Finance Tracker
description: Financial management mobile app with interactive dashboards and secure Python backend integration for tracking income/expenses.

title: Face Detection & Landmark Tracking
description: A research-focused implementation guide covering the transition from basic face detection to advanced 68-point landmark tracking.

title: Phone-to-Graphic-Tablet
description: Innovative cross-platform tool transforming smartphone touchscreens into real-time PC drawing tablets for digital artists.

title: K-means Visualizer
description: Dynamic web application for visualizing the K-means clustering algorithm, built with FastAPI and Matplotlib.

title: California Housing Price Predictor
description: ML model predicting housing prices using scikit-learn, featuring comprehensive data preprocessing and evaluation metrics.

title: DragNDropTeX
description: No-code LaTeX editor featuring a block-based interface (Scratch-style) for accessible document creation.

title: YouTube MP3/MP4 Converter
description: Python-based desktop utility for high-quality media conversion and downloading from YouTube.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Flask-based professional portfolio featuring responsive design, dark mode, and interactive project filtering.
